name: EDSIGCON | CONISAR 2019
description: EDSIGCON is a conference devoted to Information Systems & Computing Education. CONISAR is dedicated to research in the areas of data analytics, Information Systems managment, cybersecurity, data privacy, big data managment, cloud and virtualization, and ethical issues.
